Scripts.OnLoad:
if MiDKP_Options["show_raid_only"] then self:SetChecked(1) else self:SetChecked(0) end
getglobal(self:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MIDKP_TEXT_ONLY_RAID);

this.raidchannel=1 this.guildchannel=nil this.officerchannel=nil this.partychannel=nil this.event=nil this.item=nil this.members=1 self.button_count = 0; self.selectedSuite = {} MiDKP_UIHelp.Util.InitSuiteCheckButtons()

Scripts.OnKeyDown: if key =="ESCAPE" then self:Hide() end if key =="ENTER" then MiDKP_UI.MemberPick.OK_OnClick(self); end
if key =="ESCAPE" then self:Hide() end if key =="ENTER" then MiDKP_UI.Raid.RaidEditFrameOK_OnClick(self); end
if key =="ESCAPE" then self:Hide() end if key =="ENTER" then MiDKP_UI.Member.AddMemberButton_OnClick(self); end
